advice.pattern: Unable to complete network request to host
advice.message:
Please check:
  • Press 'ping' to make sure the port is accessible.
  • Check firewalls.
  • Edit /etc/firebird/2.5/firebird.conf line 'RemoteBindAddress=localhost' to 'RemoteBindAddress='
Please check the database name and try again.
Please check the Help and down on the page read how to create a Firebird database.

This requires to enable WireCrypt in firebird.conf:
  • https://www.firebirdsql.org/file/documentation/drivers_documentation/java/3.0.2/release_notes.html#notes-on-firebird-3-support
  • https://github.com/FirebirdSQL/jaybird/wiki/Jaybird-and-Firebird-3
